FileFormat.FormatDescription: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 11/2023 (v.116)- Priority over fmt/1886 Resource Interchange File Format (RIFF). Submitted by Brigham Young University.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.
